sentences.en: Dona was rejoicing in her new - found freedom.
sentences.cn: 唐娜陶醉在她新发现的自由王国里.

sentences.en: Finding a job should have been an occasion for rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 找到工作本该值得高兴.

sentences.en: Garbo plays the Queen, rejoicing in the love she has found with Antonio.
sentences.cn: 嘉宝饰演王后，陶醉于和安东尼奥的热恋中。

sentences.en: He always managed to make her seem in the wrong, and then went his way rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 他经常把她摆在似乎是错误的一方, 然后才高高兴兴地动身.

sentences.en: Here then we reached a moment of relief, and indeed of rejoicing, about the desert war.
sentences.cn: 关于沙漠上战事,我们到这里才达到缓和的, 而且的确是欢欣的时刻.

sentences.en: I personally haven't tasted any entomological specimens lately, but I am still rejoicing in the limitless curiosity, the draws me to books and people and places.I hope I never lose it.
sentences.cn: 我个人最近并未品尝任何昆虫的标本，但我仍欣喜于自己无限的好奇心，它促使我博览群书、乐于与人交往和四处旅行。 我希望永远拥有好奇心。

sentences.en: She went home rejoicing, knowing that soon something must come of it.
sentences.cn: 她回家时非常高兴, 知道这事肯定很快就会有好的结果.

sentences.en: The bridge was completed in 1811 amidst much rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 大桥于1811年竣工,当时大家欢欣鼓舞.

sentences.en: The day Bunkie was fired there was great rejoicing and much drinking of champagne.
sentences.cn: 邦克被解职的那天,大家欢欣鼓舞,大喝香槟.

sentences.en: The new moon was the occasion of festivals of rejoicing in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 在埃及，新月之时是欢庆之日。

sentences.en: The unrest has cast a pall over what is usually a day of national rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 动荡的局势给往常举国欢庆的日子蒙上了阴影。

sentences.en: There was general rejoicing at the news.
sentences.cn: 听到这一消息大家普遍感到高兴。

sentences.en: There were scenes of rejoicing at the news.
sentences.cn: 听到这一消息,大家兴高采烈.

sentences.en: They gaily ascended the downs , rejoicing in their own penetration at every glimpse of blue sky.
sentences.cn: 她们兴高采烈地登上山冈, 非常高兴能仔细观察湛蓝的云彩的每一次隐约的闪现.

sentences.en: Throughout the village, there were many similar scenes of rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 同样的欢笑声在村里到处都起来了.

trans.tran_cn: （使）欣喜[高兴，快乐]( rejoice的现在分词 )，非常高兴，深感欣喜
